title: Spiritual Healing, Energy Healing, Syracuse, NY, Energy Healing Course
description: Energy Healing, Spiritual Healing, Chakra Balancing, Yoga Teacher, Guided Meditation, Transformational Life Coach, Energy Healing Course, Syracuse, New York
sitename: Spirit Works | You are a Magnificent Soul here to create Heaven on Earth!
cleaned_text: Energy Healing, Health Coaching and Spiritual Guidance As an energy healer, I channel high frequency light into the person's energy field to open the chakras, remove blocks and raise your vibration so the body can heal itself. Together, we identify what you wish to transform in the session(s). As a channel, I may share spiritual guidance and messages from your Higher Self, Spirit Guides, Angels and deceased loved ones. Align with the truth of who you are. You are a powerful and magnificent creator! You are a sacred being of light. I look forward to working with you to realize your highest potential and become the person you are meant to be! Contact Elizabeth Wright at 315-352-3352 for a free consultation. [beth@energyhealingteacher.com](mailto:beth@energyhealingteacher.com) "I have been using Beth as my energy healer for close to 15 years. She is amazing! Her knowledge, expertise, gifted abilities and dedication to humanity are second to none. I am blessed to have found her and anyone who receives a healing session will experience for themselves the miracle of her work." ~Kimberley Hernandez
